name: flash-cannon
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it at once. It may also lower the foe’s Sp. Def stat.
flavor_text.platinum: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it at once. It may also lower the foe’s Sp. Def stat.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it at once. It may also lower the foe’s Sp. Def stat.
